title: New: The Half Earth – Borders
body:
This absolutely beautiful, otherworldly new track from Sheffield’s **The Half Earth**, comes ahead of embarking on a full UK with Lucy Rose.

_Borders_ is by far his most confident, ambitious effort yet, and showcases his stunning vocal range. Simultaneously intimate yet profoundly over the top, it feels like a very important step forward for The Half Earth. Check it out below, alongside a live session recorded for Mahogany.
